name: Delicious (avos) Declutter
description: Removes some of the excessive white space, images and buttons from Delicious(avos) 'my links' page. Note: Due to Delicious's latest redesign, this style works on previous.delicious.com. It does not work on the newest version of the Delicious links page. If you want a simplified style for the most recent update, try style 85566
additional_info:
- Reduced size of user icon
- Removed buttons for 'links' and 'stacks' at top of page as they are accessible under 'profile' in the header.
- Decreased size of bulk action box (tag filter, add tag, add to stack, etc.)
- Decreased size of tabs for own links & feeds
- Removed picture from link description
- streamlined tags in link description to take up less space
